actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to postpone the increase in the minimum wage and the adjustment to the tip credit under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
short_title: Inflation Reduction and Jobs Protection Act

summary.text: Inflation Reduction and Jobs Protection Act - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to postpone (1) the minimum wage of $2.90 and (2) modification of the formula for determining the amount of wages which an employer is deemed to have paid to a tipped employee from the year beginning January 1, 1979, to the year beginning January 1, 1980. Postpones a subsequent increase in the minimum wage and further modification of such formula by one year.

titles.title: Inflation Reduction and Jobs Protection Act
A bill to postpone the increase in the minimum wage and the adjustment to the tip credit under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
